# commandDescriptions(inSuite:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the command descriptions contained in the suite identified by `suiteName`.

## Declaration

```swift
func commandDescriptions(inSuite suiteName: String) -> [String : NSScriptCommandDescription]?
```

## Discussion

Each command description (instance of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSScriptCommandDescription]) in the returned dictionary is identified by command name.

## Getting and Registering Command Descriptions

- **commandDescription(withAppleEventClass:andAppleEventCode:)**: Returns the command description identified by a suite’s four-character Apple event code of the class (`eventClass`) and the four-character Apple event code of the command (`commandCode`).
- **register(_:)**: Registers command description `commandDesc` for use by Cocoa’s built-in scripting support by storing it in a per-suite internal dictionary under the command name.
